website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a few medium-sized squishies that are likely to live up to your expectations when it comes to texture and design, chances are you will enjoy this whale, bird, and unicorn.
pros: A cute, colorful trio that smells pleasant and rises slowly
Nice mid-range size that fits in the palm of your hand
cons: Rare reports of cracks developing in the material

customer_reviews.title: Great toys for young (5 or 6 year old and up) and old alike!!!
customer_reviews.text: All the kids love these! They are kind of fun to hold and squeeze. Might also be good in a nursing home for older folks to exercise their hands by playing with these things! My 2 year old grandson got hold of one and decided to bite the ears off.....so I wouldn't recommend them for kids under 5 or 6. Might present a choking hazard to young kids and pets! Overall though, if you pick one up you may not be able to put it down!
customer_reviews.author: marksports

customer_reviews.title: 11 year old loves them
customer_reviews.text: My sister is eleven and is infatuated with Squishies, why? I don't know. They're an interesting material that does squish well, they sort of remind me of stress balls in a way. They have a nice smell, some don't like it, but I think it's a pleasant smell. This gift was perfect for her and anyone in that range, I'd say 8-12.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute but way smaller than I expected. They're not nearly as big as the others I've bought of the squishy toys. So far they seem well made but with a little bit of time with the kids that may change. Overall I'm happy with these just not with the sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute, my daughter loved them. I like that they don't hurt to step on when she leaves them out! I also use one as a stress relief, just a few squeezes and I feel better. Colors are bright, no tears or holes, just an overall good product!
customer_reviews.author: Tina D

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old niece is obsessed with squishies. Got these for her Easter basket and they were a HUGE hit. Love the variety in the animals/creatures, perfect size and the smell is actually pretty good as well. Would definitely recommend for anyone else with a squishie lover in their family
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith 1

customer_reviews.title: It was my favorite. Then on a plane I lost the owl
customer_reviews.text: These squishys came in a little drawstring bag and where really squishy. I lost the narwhal almost immediately. It was my favorite. Then on a plane I lost the owl. I still have the unicorn. It is hard, compared to my new peach squishy. It is not the brands fault that I lost the squishys, but the unicorn was just plain hard. That is why I have it 4 stars instead of 5
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Pope

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed when they arrived and the whale already had a ...
customer_reviews.text: I Bought these items for stocking stuffers. I was disappointed when they arrived and the whale already had a tear on the tail. I’m happy to say after I emailed the company then sent a brand new set. Thank you! Now, we will see how much they are loved and how long they last once the kids get their hands on them. They are super cute too!
customer_reviews.author: April Walker

customer_reviews.title: Cute toys
customer_reviews.text: Loved this squishies. And so does my niece. They are super cute. Very colorful. And smell fruity. They came in a little tote as well. My niece loves to take them out to play. Then putting them back in their bag when she's done.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These squishies are very cute. I love the narwal! The size is perfect, a little smaller than other squishies, but makes it very suitable to throw in a bag to play with while traveling. Nice pleasant smell, very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Arrived torn
customer_reviews.text: One of them were torn very disappointing when I went to put it in my daughter's birthday bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Carber

customer_reviews.title: Very cute; rather fragile
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos really loved these, but I found that they tear pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: ATXMomma

customer_reviews.title: So Squishie!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that the owl regains it's shape really fast so I can squish it again. The narwhal has a clip to put it on my backpack. The unicorn is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Cute and small!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Smaller than I expected but my girls loved them! Great for smaller kids!
customer_reviews.author: Niel Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but the unicorn ripped on the first day. Maybe it’s the design? There is a seem where the legs are attached to the body. But disappointed since that was her favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Alleyson

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. No to big or small. Sent is perfect not plastic smell just the sent. I'll buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and squishy
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and squishy, my little girl loves these, whimsical and smell like cotton candy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's friend loved these. They were an adorable birthday gift!

customer_reviews.title: Squish them all
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly as expected. Super bright, and super squishy.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLYN BREWER

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, delivered quickly and product is just as ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, delivered quickly and product is just as described, excited to gift this to my daughter who LOVES squishies
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my 8 year old twins. They are a handheld size, which make them easy to travel/pack. Squishy and they didn't smell bad.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: Ripped and tore within 3 days of giving these to my daughters. Very disappointed in the quality. Don't waste your money like I did!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hoger

customer_reviews.title: They are going to be perfect to tuck into Christmas stockings
customer_reviews.text: The squishies are really cute. They are not the jumbo, about the size of an adults palm. They are going to be perfect to tuck into Christmas stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Kmac

customer_reviews.title: Arrived ripped
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and smell like candy, but one of them arrived ripped. Since they came as a theee pack I had already given the other two away before even noticing this one was ripped :-(
customer_reviews.author: nbgby

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves these. There was an unpleasant smell ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these. There was an unpleasant smell when they were opened, but it went away within a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: minnie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved them but they ripped in no time, no durability at all.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was excited to find these in her stocking. They are very soft and slow rising. Cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Cher Benton

customer_reviews.title: Sad product.
customer_reviews.text: My kids (10 and 14 year old girls) specifically requested these for their stocking. It is the day after Christmas and 2 of them are already tearing at the seams. If they were younger and rougher I would totally understand but they have only played with them sporadically and used them for the purpose they were intended. Sad product.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Nozzarella

customer_reviews.title: Still very cool.
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves these. She said they are "fast rising" so not as slow as some other squishies. Still very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Loy

customer_reviews.title: Unique but small
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but sort of small for the money. See them on instagram : @sprinkleslimezbynoelle
customer_reviews.author: PEACHYHOLLY

customer_reviews.title: So cute and just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than my hand but so cute and exactly as pictured. They are more durable than some others my daughter has.
customer_reviews.author: MK Wood

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked them. The smell is a bit gross to me because I'm sensitive to smells but it has seemed to get less intense has time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily
customer_reviews.text: These are cute squishies, but horribly made. They have all ripped within the first week. I do not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Each falling apart FAST
customer_reviews.text: These lasted less than 24 hours before all 3 were badly cracked and falling apart. This was under gentile squeezing, and mostly just being held.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daugher says these are the squishiest... and that gets 5 stars from the 9 year old!

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Our daughter really enjoys these toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Braisted

customer_reviews.title: These look fantastic out of the packaging and feel great
customer_reviews.text: These look fantastic out of the packaging and feel great. But they started tearing within a few hours of my 12 year old playing with them. Additionally the paint is peeling off the unicorn and the whale. Really frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, colorful though
customer_reviews.text: Products are not durable they reap easily. Got reaped less than 2 hours if having them

customer_reviews.title: ... a Christmas gift for my girlfriend's son and he loved them!
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a Christmas gift for my girlfriend's son and he loved them!

customer_reviews.title: Cute but torn
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my daughter's Easter basket. They are all adorable and smell good, but unfortunately the big one had a huge rip in the neck area. The unicorn and narwhal are perfect, but it is hard to play with the other one because she is scared it is going to tear into two parts.

customer_reviews.title: cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: uneven lines, cheap quality.all of them arrived in used ziplock.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! They were adorable and my daughter loved them! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: cctmom

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved the squish toys
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved the squish toys. I'm not sure I understand the attraction to these toys but as long as she loves it that is what is important. They also have a pleasant fragrance.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: They were not slow rising and one of them came ripped and damaged

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars!

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected which was a bonus!

customer_reviews.title: It was my daughter's favorite and she is very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The unicorn wings came ripped and the end of the tail is ripped off. Is there a way to get this one item replaced? It was my daughter's favorite and she is very disappointed! The other items were completely intact!

customer_reviews.title: my daughter loved them and smell super but

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointing this close to Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the package the unicorn was in pieces. It was torn in half and also the wing was only partially connected. Pretty disappointing this close to Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: but they tear apart easily. My daughter got these for Christmas and each ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and squishy, but they tear apart easily. My daughter got these for Christmas and each of them is already torn.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: After one day of light use they were already ripping and falling apart. Very cute at first though.

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller...
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller then most jumbo squishy toys. Good quality and nice yellow bag. My kids loved them!

customer_reviews.title: All of them came sort of ripped. The unicorns ...

customer_reviews.title: ... was very sloppy and the unicorn falls apart very easy. Breaking off where the wings meet the body
customer_reviews.text: The paint was very sloppy and the unicorn falls apart very easy. Breaking off where the wings meet the body!! 😞😞

customer_reviews.title: it smells very good and it was very soft
customer_reviews.text: When I open the bag, it smells very good and it was very soft. My daughter like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: wulangtao

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and break quickly
customer_reviews.text: Two of these fell apart within the first week, we only have one left. The unicorn head, under the neck and tail came off very fast. I have purchased a lot of similar squishies for my daughter over the last few years and never had them fall apart so quickly. Very disappointed with this purchase and I do not recommend due to the quality. They are very cute so I feel that 2 stars seems fair for the reason. Maybe if you purchase just to set them on a shelf and not use or squeeze them, then they might be a nice purchase for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Old lady smell
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. SUPER small. And they smell terrible!! Like, really bad perfume!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Broken tail
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set as a Christmas gift for my daughter. The narwhal’s tail is broken! It’s too late to get a replacement in time...

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Does not come as advertised. Narwal was pink and horn was torn, owl was blue. Disappointed!

customer_reviews.text: This super cute toy , my daughter loves it so much , super soft.

customer_reviews.title: Good Seller, but a Mediocre Product
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was good, and the delivery time was acceptable. However, the quality of the Squishy Toys is not great. Granted, this is a relatively cheap product, and the rule of thumb is that you generally get what you pay for. Basically, the Squishy Toys smell great and my daughters like them, but pieces of the foam are already falling off and there are stress cracks in the joint areas of the toys (minimal use over a period of 24 hours).
customer_reviews.author: Todd Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 9-year-old daughter. Very cute, but really poor quality. With the first squeeze, small tears appeared. I am extremely disappointed with this purchase and will not recommend it to anyone looking for value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Miche

customer_reviews.title: I am a bit disappointed. One came out of the box with a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit disappointed. One came out of the box with a tear in it. I am not sure how to go about getting a refund. The others are great, but this flaw disappoints me.

customer_reviews.text: Durability is poor. They look very cute but the unicorn and the pink one are already tearing at a seam.

customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast, but got two unicorns and one bird instead of getting a whale. Not what I was hoping for.

customer_reviews.title: Great if they weren't filthy
customer_reviews.text: The squishes are pretty good in that they are slow rise and don't stink but are scented. But they were dirty and the dirt won't wash off. Like the dirt is embedded in the foam or the dye/paint. Out of the package they look like they've been toted around by grimy little hands for a week already. Yuck!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome squishies
customer_reviews.text: These squishies are really cute and have a nice smell. They are a gift for my daughter, but would also make a great gift for any child. The set of 3 squishies even come in a reusable bag for easy storage to keep them clean.

product_meta.title: acetek Squishy Toys 3 pcs Random Color, Cute Kawaii Soft Squishies Toy, Unicorn, Bird, Whale, Stress Relieve Squeeze Soft Lovely Toy Kids Gift Fidget Toy Slow Rising Miniature Novelty Toys Decoration
feature_bullets: Material: Elastic Environmental PU, soft, after squish, they can bounce back and very cute to relieve stress
Multi Shapes: 3 PCS ,Cute shapes include colorful horse, whale(color random), bird(color random)
Size: colorful horse:11*8*3cm whale:11*6cm bird:10*5.5cm Bird&Whale color is random

Stress Relieve/Cute Ornaments/Kids Toy: You can squeeze them to relieve stress/fidget, or hang them from your bag or room, decorate your room, office desk, pleasure in party, also can be gift for kids, very popular with children
Note: The toys have fragrance yummy smell, Please watch out your kids put it in mouth when play with it.
